title: DRY KILL LOGIC Explains Their Return To The Stage, Teases New Music
description: Dry Kill Logic will rip through tracks from The Dead And Dreaming at Welcome To Rockville.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: Dry Kill Logic will rip through tracks from The Dead And Dreaming at Welcome To Rockville.
text: Dry Kill Logic will hit the stage for the first time in 16 years at Welcome To Rockville 2025 alongside the preparation of some new music. So why return to the stage now after all these years? Dry Kill Logic guitarist Jason Bozzi explains: "We've been away for a while but have always enjoyed the process of creating new music together. Our new music is an accurate articulation of who we are individually and collectively, and we're excited to share it with everyone." On the new single coming in 2025, vocalist Cliff Rigano added: "The excitement and anticipation are overwhelming. To finally return to the stage after all these years, especially at a festival like Welcome to Rockville, is something we never thought would happen. We're incredibly excited to see everyone." Dry Kill Logic will rip through tracks from The Dead And Dreaming at Welcome To Rockville, as well as a mix of their classic hits. So if you've been dying for some solid nü-metal on the stage once again, here it is! In the meantime, jam Dry Kill Logic's 2020 single "Don't See Ghosts" below. Welcome To Rockville 2025 will take place at the Daytona International Speedway in Daytona Beach, FL between May 15 and 18. Check out the full lineup here. Want More Metal? html:
Dry Kill Logic will hit the stage for the first time in 16 years at Welcome To Rockville 2025 alongside the preparation of some new music.

So why return to the stage now after all these years? Dry Kill Logic guitarist Jason Bozzi explains: "We've been away for a while but have always enjoyed the process of creating new music together. Our new music is an accurate articulation of who we are individually and collectively, and we're excited to share it with everyone."

On the new single coming in 2025, vocalist Cliff Rigano added: "The excitement and anticipation are overwhelming. To finally return to the stage after all these years, especially at a festival like Welcome to Rockville, is something we never thought would happen. We're incredibly excited to see everyone."

Dry Kill Logic will rip through tracks from The Dead And Dreaming at Welcome To Rockville, as well as a mix of their classic hits. So if you've been dying for some solid nü-metal on the stage once again, here it is! In the meantime, jam Dry Kill Logic's 2020 single "Don't See Ghosts" below.

Welcome To Rockville 2025 will take place at the Daytona International Speedway in Daytona Beach, FL between May 15 and 18. Check out the full lineup here.
